title: we gonna get voice chat or??????

replies.body:
I thought we already have VC for premades
EDIT: I wouldn't know because I don't have friends to play with.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2a19jhfG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-10T01:18:00.938+0000)
>
> I thought we already have VC for premades
> EDIT: I wouldn't know because I don't have friends to play with.

Yeah but that's fucking useless when Discord, Skype, Teamspeak, etc. exist.

We want voice chat with randoms that would be great af
"We" dont. This is not overwatch and we dont need to hear squeaker trash screaming into their mics.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2a19jhfG,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-10T01:29:58.272+0000)
>
> "We" dont. This is not overwatch and we dont need to hear squeaker trash screaming into their mics.

There would be a mute button for people who don't want to use it. It's not mandatory, just a cool option for the people who do :3

League got voicechat months ago.

Nobody cared.
